column2: Openly available without contacting the author(s)
column3: Deposited in a database or repository
column4: Assigned a unique identifier such as a DOI
column5: A traditional research paper is based on the data
column6: A data paper (without conclusions) describes the data
column7: Packaged with a thorough description of the data
column8: Packaged with formal metadata describing the data (e.g. as XML)

column1: Collection and processing methods were evaluated
Descriptive text is thorough enough to use or replicate the dataset
Necessary metadata is standardized (e.g. in XML)
Technical details have been checked (e.g. no missing files no missing values)
Plausibility considered based on area expertise
